issue.title: C++: Add "lite" DCHECK macros used in parquet-cpp
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-70](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-70). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This avoids adding an otherwise potentially onerous glog dependency and enabling DEBUG assertions in public header files. See parquet/util/logging.h

comments.body:
